frontmatter.title: Are Yonex Badminton Shoes Any Good? (An Honest Review)
frontmatter.description: I’ve been fortunate that ever since I was young my father would buy me good quality Badminton shoes. He did his research and Yonex shoes were always at the top everyone’s lists. We were even luckier to be able to try on various models thanks to our local Badminton shop. I’ve been through countless pairs of Yonex shoes and yet people always ask. Are Yonex Badminton shoes any good?
